reviews.text:
if you‚Äôre in the city and you want to try authentic italian food you need to come here!!
ve lo consiglio 100%
Migliore pasta italiana di NYC.
excellent pesto and arrabiata pasta!
Food was amazing and affordable and staff were very friendly and welcoming.
Molto buono!!
Ottima matriciana sembra di stare a casa
so yummy!!  will definitely be back
It was so yummy!!!
Sempre spettacolareüëçüèª
God mat, snabb service, bra pris
Had the pasta giusto and rigatoni Amatriciana - tons of flavor, creamy, and exactly what I wanted
best italian in hell's kitchen ‚ù§Ô∏è such a cozy and homey meal
All very interesting the pasta night! The only not positive note was the tall guy at the entrance who was rude and boorish
I was here for the carbonara the night before NYC marathon 2025. It was really good, and the staffs were also very friendly. Reasonable prices as well.
da evitare, una pasta precotta e un bicchiere di acqua 40 dollari. folle mettere un cucchiaino di parmigiano per evitare che il commensale ne metta troppo

A real Italian restaurant in NYC. I am Italian, born and raised, and I can assure that this place offers real Italian dishes, just like the one you can find in Italy, with a very high quality of taste. I will be back on my next visit in the city.
Excellent and exceptional!
The best Italian in New York! Wow, I can not fault any aspect, such a great find. Thank you!!
Best food we had in new york. Great for couple, friends and family for kids! Thank you guys
The most delicious homemade fusilli  with a pumpkin Gorgonzola sauce and Italian sausage. The server‚Äôs wine suggestion paired perfectly. Delicious meal in a cozy spot.
Fresh pasta üëç
an absolute gem for any Italian-food loving people!
What a place, what a pasta, what a staff. I love everything‚Ä¶

Very cute restaurant with 8-10 tables. Amazing service and staff. They have a relatively small menu which is fantastic as they focus on specific dishes. I asked my pasta to be customised and was done without hesitation and the order was perfect
Abbiamo mangiato qua durante la nostra vacanza a NY! Ragazzi simpaticissimi carbonara squisita servizio top!!

We came for the ‚Äúall you can eat‚Äù pasta night 6-8pm on Wednesdays that many people saw on Instagram showcasing all you can eat pizza and 5 different pastas with a glass of wine.

First issue- they cut the event down into 2 one hour sessions and the room was packed.

They only served three kinds of pasta, and one of them was literally just the first kind of pasta with an addition of a couple tiny pieces of what we think was pancetta.

Pasta 1- a watery mac and cheese
Pasta 2 - something with a red sauce and either capers or olives.

The pizza was in tiny bite sized portions and was cold/without cheese.

They also passed fried dough which was good, but without the powder sugar.

Everything was just mediocre. This restaurant has such great reviews normally.  It makes me wonder if they downgraded their quality for the event.

There was only one server bringing out the food on the smallest tray ever- which could only fit about four plates of food which took forever.  He also looked pretty unhappy with having to deal with so many people which I understand, but they should‚Äôve hired another person for the event.

Maybe this event was great before someone posted about it on Instagram, but it did not live up to the expectations that were put out there. It seems like many people were unhappy with the experience bc it was not what was advertised.

Went to their pasta night on Wednesday at 6 pm. Never again. They packed the place to the brim. It must be some kind of violation to do so. People bumping into each other and spilling wine. They brought out 2 kinds of pasta. One was good. The other terrible. I didn‚Äôt finish mine. The lady next to me said that she placed her half eaten pasta plate back in the tray they were serving from and they served it to someone else!! üò≥ I do want to call out the servers. They navigated the crowd and served with such patience. They should not be put through an environment like this. I would not recommend. They need to change many things. Especially the number of people crammed in there! The best part was leaving.

The unlimited pasta night is a bad idea. Standing room only, they packed the place like sardines, and only for an hour.

The food was ok.

I do want to call out the staff though. Despite all that, they did a great job
Obbligatorio passare a trovare Ludovico ed i suoi per una pasta eccezionale.

Best Cannoli I have ever had!
Kind people.
Looking forward to going there again.
The carbonara was very delicious and such a cute space!
Had a wonderful meal - very friendly staff and great food. Grazie mille!
l‚ÄôItalia a New York!
Tutto perfetto e personale gentile

L'Italia nel cuore di NY! A partire dalla playlist della musica che ho amato, tutto molto familiare. Ho preso la lasagna che mi √® piaciuta tantissimo, ottima qualit√† e ingredienti freschi. Mario il cameriere/responsabile √® stato davvero gentilissimo e mi ha fatto sentire a casa!

This is a great spot to grab super delicious pasta at great prices. Everything tasted super delicious, rich and homemade. My favorite was the rigatone amatriciana, but I can‚Äôt wait to be back to try the rest of dishes. They have lunch specials for $10 Monday to Friday and on Wednesday evenings for $20 they have a pasta party where they serve unlimited pasta, pizza and wine! I am looking forward to making a return to this spot very soon! I highly recommend this spot over any of the over hyped tourists spots if you are looking for good pasta!
Best italian Kitchen in new york city, 5 stars cause i can‚Äôt give them 10üëè
Piatti abbondanti e cibo buono..... Locale piccolo ma carino

Perfetto per sentirsi come a casa in una citt√† totalmente dispersiva.... e lontana! üíö
E hanno il caff√® VERO!!!
Great atmosphere and excellent service

The food was amazing! We ordered Crudo e Burrata, Parmigiana Di Melanzana, Tonnarelli Alla Carbonara, and Velluda Zucca ‚Äî everything was delicious.

The Velluda Zucca was my favorite, I‚Äôd never tried something so good before. For dessert, the Panna Cotta al Caramello was incredible, and the restaurant surprised us with Tiramisu and authentic Italian coffee. Such a lovely detail ‚Äî I‚Äôd definitely come back! üáÆüáπüòç
Definitely worth a visit, you can taste the fresh pasta. The service is great, the music is great. Great prices, better than any other Italian restaurant on 9th ave.

If your idea of "pasta night" is standing shoulder to shoulder like sardines on the subway during rush hour, then run don't walk to this place.

This review is for their Wednesday pasta night or at least the attempt at it. Got there at 5.40 and had 1-2 people in line. By 6pm the line was around the corner, at which point the "manager" or "owner" told us we needed to go at the back of the line from waiting in front of the entrance.

By 6.15 we had finally made it inside and it was already too packed to even stand (the only option during Pasta Night). Decided it wasn't worth the "good vibes" or even the $20, so went next door and had delicious tapas and paella. By 7pm the inside was packed and outside there was still a line of people.
Ludo and his team are amazing!! Delicious food, amazing service, and the vibes are immaculate.
Real italian cuisine!
ËøôÊòØÂú®Á∫ΩÁ∫¶ÂêÉÁöÑÊúÄÂêé‰∏ÄÈ°øÈ•≠ÔºåÂ∞è‰ºô‰º¥ËØ¥ÂíåÂú®ÊÑèÂ§ßÂà©ÂêÉÂà∞ÁöÑ‰∏ÄÊ†∑Ê≠£ÂÆóÁæéÂë≥ÔºåËÄÅÊùøÊúÄÂêéËøòÈÄÅ‰∫ÜÁîúÂìÅ„ÄÇÈöæÂøò
Uno dei migliori ristoranti italiani in america, pasta fantastica soprattutto pasta fresca, esperienza fantastica!
Penso uno dei migliori ristoranti di pasta italiani veri! Consigliatissimo
Lovely experience. Great Pasta.
Delicious, fresh pasta. Atmosphere is cozier and classier than the pictures depicted.  Great experience!

La mia esperienza da Pasta Eater a Hell‚Äôs Kitchen √® stata davvero speciale.

Ci sono tornato pi√π volte perch√© ogni piatto √® stato spettacolare.

I tonnarelli alla carbonara mi hanno fatto venire la pelle d‚Äôoca, e nelle altre occasioni ho assaggiato anche le polpette della nonna, il polpo con patate, il tiramis√π e i cannoli: tutti autentici e buonissimi, con un‚Äôautenticit√† che raramente trovi fuori dall‚ÄôItalia.

Ho partecipato anche al loro Pasta Night del mercoled√¨ (6pm‚Äì8pm) ed √® stato spettacolare: atmosfera vivace, piatti di qualit√† e un‚Äôenergia che ti fa venire voglia di tornare ancora.

Locale accoglientissimo, con uno staff che ti fa sentire davvero a casa e tanta passione in ogni dettaglio.

Una tappa obbligatoria a New York!

Siamo stati qu√¨ ad agosto dopo aver incontrato Ludovico per strada (troppo simpatico)
Abbiamo mangiato benissimo , eravamo in 4 e abbiamo preso 4 tipi di pasta diverse per assaggiarle tutte. Tutte squisite e poi abbiamo preso 4 dolci ,tiramis√π ,cannoli e millefoglie fantastici.
Locale molto carino e accogliente, personale cordiale.
L‚Äôunica cosa che ci √® dispiaciuta √® di non essere venuti al pasta night del mercoled√¨ ma tranquillo Ludovico l‚Äôanno prossimo torniamo a New York e questa volta non mancheremo üòâ a presto

Da italiana che vive qui, ho voluto provare questo ristorante con alte aspettative che sono state soddisfatte! Sicuramente una chicca per i newyorkesi alla ricerca di un ristorante con cucina italiana.
Il locale piccolino ma bello e ben organizzato, mi √® piaciuto il clima che c‚Äôera quella sera.  Abbiamo preso due antipasti e 3 paste, tutte molto buone, avrei preso anche un dolce ma eravamo troppo pieni. Unico accorgimento: nella carbonara la pancetta era un po bruciacchiata.
Sicuramente torner√≤, per provare qualcos‚Äôaltro. Auguro ai ragazzi ,che hanno aperto il locale, un gran successo!

Ottimo ristorante di pasta a NY! Conosciuto su instagram ho voluto provarlo. Le aspettative sono state soddisfatte. La mia lasagne al bolognese erano un pochino salate. Ma per il resto tutto apposto. Prezzi in media con quelli di NY! Consigliato.

Visited this place several times, each time the pasta was cooked to perfection! The sauce was perfectly balanced to the taste of the dish. I have already saved the place and I would highly recommend anyone in the area to check it out!

This place was incredible! I got the caprese salad and lemon fettuccine, and both were fresh and the pasta was perfectly al dente. You can tell that they care about the quality of their food and service. When I return to the city, I will be sure to come back to Pasta Eater for more.

Seguiamo Ludovico su Instagram e grazie alle sue dritte il nostro viaggio a NY √® stato pi√π semplice. Che dire del suo locale... entri e magicamente ti senti a casa... cordiali, ospitali e simpatici. Il cibo √® buonissimo, di qualit√† e abbondante, il servizio e la pulizia √® impeccabile. Una nota super positiva per Ciro che ci ha coccolati all'italiana col suo essere socievole. Consigliamo vivamente a tutti gli italiani e non solo a venire da Ludovico.

Siamo venuti qua a cena con molte aspettative, e tutte soddisfatte ampiamente!
Pasta fatta in casa e buonissima, prodotti di qualit√† e italiani.
Abbiamo mangiato amatriciana e carbonara che raramente si trovano cos√¨ buone anche in Italia!
Come dolce tiramis√π e cannoli siciliani spettacolari.
Bravo Ludovico e complimenti a tutto il suo staff.
Se siete a NY assolutamente consigliato andarci, tra tanti posti 'finti' italiani, il suo ristorante sa proprio di casa e non vi lascer√† delusi.
Continua cos√¨ Ludovico!

Pasta Eater √® tappa obbligatoria a New York, soprattutto per gli italiani. Conosciuta tramite i canali social di Ludovico che si presenta nel locale professionale ma allo stesso tempo molto gentile e disponibile. I piatti sono eccellenti e a New York non √® facile trovare primi di pasta cos√¨ gustosi. Voto 10 ed in bocca al lupo per tutto allo staff!

We had dinner at Pasta Eater and absolutely loved it! Great bruschetta, crispy Fiori di Zucca, and perfectly fried calamari. The spaghetti with clams and the amatriciana were delicious‚Äîyou can truly taste the quality of their homemade pasta. The restaurant itself is beautiful and welcoming.

Highly recommended! We‚Äôll definitely be back!

Cena perfetta!
Servizio ottimo e Ludovico super gentile e disponibile.
Se siete in vacanza o abitate a New York passateci ne vale la penale.
Ps. Prendete i fusilli con crema di asparagi e guanciale sono il top!

I had the most amazing fettuccine, took me right back to Italy. It was so delicious and fresh. The service was also wonderful and I felt very welcomed. The music in the background was also so cute. Will definitely visit again. Thank you

If you're craving authentic Italian food in New York, this is the place to go! The staff are friendly and attentive, the setting is a charming little spot, and the homemade pasta is absolutely delicious. The quality and freshness of the ingredients are top-notch. I can't recommend it enough‚Äîgo and visit Ludovico, he's the best!
Posto super carino! Pasta fatta in casa ottima! Polpette al sugo buonissime. Ci hanno servito pane e olio prima del pasto, buonissimo. Personale super !!! Cannoli siciliani top !

Great place to have a real fresh made pasta, I had the spaghetti Pomodoro and my wife had the Tonarelli Carbonara, both were right Al dente, the coffee and deserts are also something you can‚Äôt miss, the cannoli and the Tiramis√π are to die for.

Passed by and read that this place serves freshly made pasta and quickly checked out their menu. The spicy penne peperoncino caught my eye, so I decided to go in for a quick bite.
I was pleasantly surprised by the genuine friendliness of the staff. This place is small but quaint and the pasta was absolutely incredible!!!
As I was eating it, i was already mentally planning on coming back for another round because it was that delicious!  I swear I could taste Italy in every bite!
I wished I hadn't been in such a rush so I could have tried some of their other dishes. I will definitely be back!
Also this place seems to be runned by Italians from Italy not the ny ones lol
they were so sweet and proud of their business as they should be.
Highly recommend it! 10/10

Il locale √® piccolo, ma mooolto carino. Il propetario Ludovico molto simpatico. I piatti sono veramente buoni, ed un po' di cucina italiana dopo giorni di cibo americano fa solo bene. Tutto eccezionale, poi il tiramis√π... lasciamo perdere...eccezionale.

Locale italiano scoperto tramite social poich√© il proprietario ha una pagina dove da diversi consigli su New York, e tra vari video annunciava l apertura del suo locale‚Ä¶siamo andati a trovarlo e nonostante l‚Äôorario tardi ci ha accolto e ci siamo mangiati dei piatti di pasta  meravigliosi (dopo diversi giorni di hamburger, hot dog etc)
Locale super carino e il cameriere √® stato gentilissimo e super educato!!
Consiglio di andarlo a provare a chi cerca un piatto di pasta italiano a New York!!

Una vera scoperta nel cuore di New York. Pasta fresca fatta in casa, piatti autentici e veri sapori italiani....profumo di casa che ti riporta alla cucina della nonna....antipasto, primi e dessert tutto veramente molto buono.
Ludovico gentilissimo, attento e molto disponibile...un grande in bocca al lupo per questa tua avventura! "Daje che spacchi" üòâ

During my trip to New York, I tried several Italian restaurants, and this was the best. Excellent handmade Italian pasta at a good price, lots of selection, excellent desserts, and a small but comfortable place. You can really feel the Italian atmosphere. Thanks to Ludovico and especially to Mario for being amazing with us throughout the meal.

Great location. The environment is very comfortable.
The staff is very welcoming.
I tried both the carbonara and the amatriciana prepared with fresh pasta. Everything was delicious. For dessert I had the tiramisu and Sicilian cannoli, equally good. The quality/price ratio was excellent. The portions of the dishes were reasonable and the quality of the products was excellent.
I recommend Pasta eater 'n go.

Posto piccolo ma ben curato , personale simpatico ed esperto ... ma soprattutto cibo italiano buonissimo che non vi far√† rimpiangere quello che mangereste (bene) in Italia! Da provare i rigatoni all'amatriciana, la carbonara e il tiramis√π (semplicemente perfetto).
Straconsigliato (noi ci siam venuti a mangiare 2 volte in 7 giorni) anche per il rapporto prezzo/qualit√†/quantit√†.

Today I made it to Pasta Eater ‚ÄòN Go, and let me tell you, I was immediately transported back to Italy! It‚Äôs a cozy and charming spot, impeccably clean and the warm welcome from Ludovico, with his radiant energy and contagious smile, sets the perfect tone from the very first moment.
They‚Äôve opened slightly more than a week ago and the location (on 9th Ave and 50th Street) is prime! I‚Äôve felt home and the vibe there is genuinely a 100% Italian!
I started with ‚ÄúProsciutto & Burrata‚Äù as an appetizer, served in a bed of arugula and Ludovico kindly put some fresh bread on the side, both the Prosciutto Crudo and Burrata were absolutely phenomenal. The Italian prosciutto was flavorful, and the burrata melted in my mouth and left that sweet and milky aftertaste I could have literally every single day.
For my main, I went for pasta, with the ‚ÄúCaserecce and Zucchini‚Äù, part of their lunch special (with several different pasta options for just $15! A great idea for Manhattan!). The pasta was perfectly al dente (to my taste a minute more wouldn‚Äôt have hurt), but that zucchini sauce? Outrageously delicious!!! I wanted to spread it on everything.
To finish with a sweet note, Ludovico suggested a classic tiramis√π, just like my nonna used to make it and it was so good It transported me straight back to my childhood. I also got offered one Sicilian Cannoli with a remarkably good ricotta cheese inside!
So happy a place like Pasta Eater ‚ÄòN Go opened in New York and I personally wanted to give a huge shoutout to Ludovico and the team, for the kindness and hospitality.
Opening a restaurant like this in NYC is admirable, God knows it‚Äôs not easy, and they‚Äôre doing it beautifully. Wishing them all the best because they truly deserve it!
Can‚Äôt wait to be back soon to try more of their delicious pasta dishes!

This charming Italian restaurant in Hell‚Äôs Kitchen, Eater N Go, was a delightful experience! From the moment I stepped in, I felt transported to Italy. My friend and I enjoyed the food immensely‚Äîso much so that we recommended it to other friends, who also loved it!

Eater N Go offers excellent homemade pasta, cooked to perfection. I had a seafood salad that was outstanding, and the zucchini blossoms appetizer was equally delicious. My pasta with porcini mushrooms and authentic Parmesan cheese was incredible‚Äîeven better than what I had in Naples, Italy. My friend‚Äôs seafood pasta was just as delicious.

The desserts were out of this world‚Äîthe tiramisu was even better than what I can make at home, and the cannolis were so fresh that we devoured them all. We also had the pleasure of chatting with the owner, Ludgi, who welcomed us with warmth and kindness.

I hope Eater N Go maintains its food quality and doesn't change anything, because I'll definitely be back with my friends. I highly recommend this delicious gem in Hell‚Äôs Kitchen!

If you are looking for a delicious and fresh Italian meal, definitely check out this restaurant! In this little spot, you can fino an inviting atmosphere and eat an absolutely fresh and handmade pasta with a lot of options in the menu. The people who work there are the sweetest, in particular Mario and the owner Ludovico. Save this spot!

Great place to eat! The staff is super friendly and if you come for lunch they've got a 10 dollar pasta special where some selected dishes are available at that price. If you happen to be around Hells Kitchen, you can't miss this spot

Io e la mia famiglia siamo venuti qui a mangiare a pranzo ed √© stata la migliore scelta che potessimo fare! Sono certa che Ludovico e il suo staff faranno tanta strada. La pasta √® buonissima veramente rispetto a tutto il cibo americano, il personale √© top, non so cosa aggiungere. Andateci, poi mi ringraziate!

Sono stato da Pasta Eater a Hell's Kitchen Nyc e devo dire che √® stata un‚Äôesperienza eccezionale! Lo staff √® davvero cordiale e professionale, mi hanno accolto con grande gentilezza e attenzione.
Un ringraziamento speciale al proprietario Ludovico, una persona splendida, capace e molto professionale. Si vede che ama il suo lavoro e che tiene davvero ai suoi clienti.
Il cibo √® ottimo, genuino e preparato con cura.L‚Äôatmosfera √® accogliente e si respira un‚Äôenergia positiva.
Consiglio vivamente questo posto √® un angolo autentico d‚ÄôItalia dove sentirsi come a casa.

I visited Pasta Eater a Hell's Kitchen, and it was an absolutely amazing experience.
The staff was incredibly kind and professional they made me feel truly welcome from the moment I walked in.
A special thanks to Ludovico, the owner a wonderful person, highly skilled and very professional. You can tell he‚Äôs passionate about his work and truly cares about his customers.
The food was delicious, healthy, and full of authentic Italian flavor. The atmosphere was warm and positive.
Highly recommended a real Italian gem where you feel right at home.

L‚ÄôItalia a New York!
Pasta Eater ‚Äòn Go √® una piccola gemma nel cuore della citt√†. Il locale √® piccolino, ma sprigiona un‚Äôautenticit√† tutta italiana che conquista dal primo assaggio. Pasta fresca, sapori veri, e un‚Äôatmosfera calorosa che ti fa sentire subito a casa.
Un plauso speciale a Ludovico, che con passione e simpatia rende ogni visita un‚Äôesperienza da ricordare. Se cercate la vera pasta italiana a New York‚Ä¶ questo √® il posto giusto!

Pasta Eater is an absolute gem! The customer service is outstanding ‚Äî the staff is incredibly friendly, attentive, and makes you feel right at home. The fresh pasta is simply amazing, cooked to perfection with rich, flavorful sauces that taste homemade. Every dish is prepared with fresh, high-quality ingredients, and you can truly taste the difference. Highly recommend for anyone craving authentic, delicious Italian food with top-notch service! Enjoy it at @pastaeaterngo

Locale molto particolare, curato nei minimi dettagli. Atmosfera intima, piatti ottimi. Abbiamo ordinato due bolognesi, due amatriciane e una carbonara, ogni singolo piatto di altissima qualit√†. Staff molto gentile e professionale.

Late-night pasta perfection

Stopped in pretty late for pasta and was pleasantly surprised. The service was great, and I even had a nice moment to chat with the owner‚Äîwhich added a personal touch.

The pasta tasted fresh, the sauce was rich and flavorful, and the bread on the table was excellent too. Honestly, it doesn't need anything extra‚Äînot even Marco P! üòâ This place is already doing everything right.

Highly recommend for a satisfying, late-night Italian bite with a good dry Italian red wine.

Un paradiso per gli amanti della pasta! Pasta Eater √® un vero gioiello, con pasta fresca che ti conquista al primo morso. Abbiamo provato le tagliatelle alla Bolognese e i tonnarelli alla carbonara, e il sapore era autentico e pieno di carattere, degno della tradizione italiana. Anche il personale √® estremamente gentile e attento, Ludovico render√† la vostra esperienza ancora pi√π piacevole. Un luogo che consiglio vivamente a chiunque cerchi un angolo d‚ÄôItalia a New York. Ci torneremo sicuramente!

Stupefacente !!!! Paragonabile ad uno stellato italiano !!! Un vero piatto di pasta italiano fatto a regola d‚Äôarte!!  se ci fossero andrei a mangiarci senza dubbio anche in Italia da loro ma a NY assumono un sapore del tutto raro e di ottima qualit√† .. super super super consigliato !!! Bravo Ludovico  , complimenti a te ed al tuo team üëèüëèüëè

Se vai a New York e hai nostalgia dell'ottima pasta italiana, questo √® il posto giusto: pasta davvero eccezionale e abbondante. Nel locale sarai accolto dalla simpatia e gentilezza di Ludovico e del suo staff che ti faranno sentire come a casa. Consigliatissimo!!!
This place is casual yet classy! I really feel like I was in a tiny pasta joint in Italy. The pasta is phenomenal and the staff are very friendly. Ill definitely be coming back!
What a great experience! Authentic Italian food. I can say it became my favorite spot when I‚Äôm craving Italian food!

Una bellissima serata ed una cena spettacolare! A Ludovico, persona carina, gentile, e a tutto suo staff vanno i complimenti per la professionalit√† e cordialit√†.
Un pezzo di Italia a New York!!!
Abbiamo mangiato una spettacolare carbonara e amatriciana per terminare con un buonissimo tiramis√π.
Un suggerimento per tutti coloro che vanno a New York, passate da Pasta Eater N‚Äôgo e non ve ne pentirete.
Ciro was wonderful. They make fresh authentic and delicious pasta. The place is cozy and we loved the music. Definitely we will come back.

Great little spot. Tiny place but really cute! I loved the warm welcome we got from the Italian owners/ servers. Very good homemade pasta. The truffle pasta was to die for but the carbonara pasta had way too much black pepper on it we couldn‚Äôt even taste the guanciale. That‚Äôs the only thing that made me give 4 stars instead of 5. Other than that we loved the Chianti we got and the atmosphere of the restaurant. Perfect spot to have dinner before our Broadway show!

Fantastico angolo d'Italia ad Hells Kitchen, ingredienti di qualit√† servizio eccellente, ma sopratutto da rimarcare la cordialit√† e la professionalit√† di Ludovico e di tutto il suo staff. Co ti ua cos√¨ 6 grande.

5 stelle (solo perch√© Google non mi fa dare di pi√π) - Autentica Italia nel cuore di New York! (detto da un italiano che qui a New York ci vive)

Finalmente un posto che riesce a portare la vera essenza della cucina italiana a New York! Sono rimasto senza parole davanti alla pasta alle vongole: saporita, bilanciata, con un profumo di mare che mi ha riportato a Napoli.
La pasta era perfetta, al dente, olio leggero, cremosa come deve, prezzemolo fresco e vongole generose gi√† sgusciate. Un capolavoro di semplicit√† e gusto.

Un altro piatto che merita una standing ovation √® la pasta alla Nerano: cremosa, avvolgente, con quel mix perfetto tra zucchine fritte e formaggio che solo chi conosce bene la ricetta originale pu√≤ replicare. Ogni boccone √® un tuffo in Costiera, un equilibrio straordinario tra comfort food e delicatezza. Mai trovata cos√¨ fuori dall‚ÄôItalia!

E poi il tiramis√π‚Ä¶ che dire. Cremoso, delicato, con il giusto equilibrio tra caff√®, mascarpone e cacao. Nulla a che vedere con le versioni americane piene di panna: questo √® il vero tiramis√π italiano. Ogni cucchiaiata era pura poesia.

Complimenti sinceri allo staff di Pasta Eater N Go e soprattutto a Ludovico: si vede che c‚Äô√® passione, cura per gli ingredienti e amore per la tradizione. Torner√≤ prestissimo e consiglier√≤ questo posto a chiunque voglia assaggiare la vera cucina italiana. Bravissimi!

We went to this restaurant twice on our trip to New York. The Italian food and wine were soooo good! More importantly the staff were friendly, fun and welcoming. Love this place! In addition, they have an amazing happy hour deal!

Great atmosphere, service and food! The burrata tasted fresh. I really liked the signature pasta. They do lunch specials on week days and pasta night Wednesdays for $20 pasta + wine.
